# Latitude, temperature, day length

## `fixed1`

* `{farm_id} + {year} + {calving_season} + {age} + {from_may1} + {toxic_fescue} + {latitude}`. Everything would be fit as a categorical factor, except for days from May 1 and latitude

## `fixed2`

* `{year} + {calving_season} + {age_group} + {toxic_fescue} + {latitude} + {mean_apparent_high}`
* Take out `{farm_id}` because it's confounded with latitude
* Take out `{from_may1}` because it's highly correlated with `{mean_apparent_high}`
* Use age groups rather than categorical ages

## `fixed3`

* `{year} + {calving_season} + {age_group} + {toxic_fescue} + {mean_day_length} + {mean_apparent_high}`
* Replace latitude with mean day length

## `fixed4`

* `{year} + {calving_season} + {age_group} + {toxic_fescue} + {mean_day_length} + {mean_apparent_high} + {temp_length}`
* Add day length x temperature interaction term

# #`fixed13`

* `{year} + {calving_season} + {age_group} + {toxic_fescue} + {mean_day_length} + {mean_apparent_high} + {centered_temp_length}`
* `fixed4`, but center the interaction term

## `fixed5`

* `{year} + {calving_season} + {age_group} + {toxic_fescue} + {mean_day_length}`
* Only day length, no temperature

## `fixed6`

* `{year} + {calving_season} + {age_group} + {toxic_fescue} + {mean_apparent_high}`
* Only temperature, no day length

# Farm ID vs. environmental variables

## `fixed7`

* `{year} + {calving_season} + {age_group} + {toxic_fescue} + {farm_id}`
* No temperature or day length, just farm

## `fixed8`

* `{year} + {calving_season} + {age_group} + {toxic_fescue} + {mean_day_length} + {mean_apparent_high} + {farm_id}`
* Temp and day length and farm
    
# Contemporary group vs. environmental variables

## `fixed9`

* `{farm_id + year + calving_season + age_group + score_group + toxic_fescue}`
* Contemporary group only
* Model used for basic GWAS

## `fixed14`

* Exact same as `fixed9` model, but use only genotyped animals
* Running GBLUP instead of ssGBLUP to attempt to get around inbreeding/reliability issue

## `fixed10`

* `{farm_id + year + calving_season + age_group + score_group + toxic_fescue} + {mean_apparent_high}`
* Contemporary group + temp

## `fixed11`

* `{farm_id + year + calving_season + age_group + score_group + toxic_fescue} + {mean_day_length}`
* Contemporary group + day length

## `fixed12`

* `{farm_id + year + calving_season + age_group + score_group + toxic_fescue} + {mean_day_length} + {mean_apparent_high}`
* Contemporary group + temp + day length
